Banner.Description: I have 4 years of experience in creating systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and sometimes in Laravel, following best practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I am a high school student specializing in programming. I have been interested in programming since childhood, starting to create my first websites at the age of 12.
In my free time, I also love capturing landscapes in nature. I strive to be precise and always complete assigned tasks on time. I am a very articulate and trustworthy person.
I constantly aim to raise the difficulty level of what I do to create better code and more attractive projects.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Mandarin ID
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The Mandarin Group's ecosystem aims for universality in the login system across all its services. Thus, Mandarin ID was created - a simple and secure login system for all services offered and supported by the system.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: MandarinEDU
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Mandarin Edu is a platform where you can create a group, and invited students can share notes and access educational assistance. It is also a hub for information exchange, sharing lesson plans, and important announcements.

Contact.Content: I'll be happy if you reach out to me for new opportunities. Write to me, and I'll respond as soon as I see your message. A simple one-page project showcasing a profile letter with basic information about a person.
